1.location: You find yourself in a slimy grotto. The walls are covered in sticky slime and the floor is made of hard rock.

portal.content: Dive into the deep pool of slime leading north
Climb into the cave leading south

interactable.content: Examine the deep pool of slime on the grotto floor
Examine the narrow cave entrance on the grotto wall

sight.content: It is very dark, but you see a deep pool of slime in the center of the grotto.
You see a deep pool of slime in front of you.

It is very dark, but you see

a deep pool of slime

in the center of the grotto.

You see

a deep pool of slime

leading in a northerly direction.
It is very dark, but you see a narrow cave entrance on the southern wall of the grotto.
You see a narrow cave entrance in front of you.

It is very dark, but you see

a narrow cave entrance

on the southern wall of the grotto.

You see

a narrow cave

leading south.

smell.content: The grotto smells like wet slime.
The smell of slime is quite strong here.

sound.content: You hear the faint sound of dripping liquid.

2.location: You find yourself in a pitch black grotto.

portal.content: Dive into the deep pool of slime leading south

sight.content: You see something glinting in the darkness in front of you.
You see something glinting in the darkness in front of you.
You see something glinting in the darkness in front of you.
You see a dusty old human skeleton leaned against the grotto wall in the darkness in front of you.
You see a helmet on the head of the skeleton.
You see a ring on one of the fingers of the skeleton.
You see an unknown object next to the skelleton in the darkness in front of you.
You see an unknown object next to the skelleton in the darkness in front of you.
You see an unknown object next to the skelleton in the darkness in front of you.
It is almost pitch black, you see nothing.

It is very dark, but you make out

a deep pool of slime

leading south.

smell.content: The grotto smells like fungus and slime.
The smell of slime is very strong here.

sound.content: You hear a barely audible rumbling sound.

3.location: You find yourself in a pine forest. Giant pine trees surround you. The forest floor is covered in layers upon layers of brown pine leaves and patches of green moss.

portal.content: Climb back into the cave leading north
Head westwards on the path through the trees

sight.content: Tall trees stretches on for as far as you are able to see in all directions but north. To the north you see a large grey mountain wall blocking your path, ferns grow thick at the base of the mountain.

You see

a narrow cave entrance

on the northern side of the area.

You see

a narrow cave

leading north to a grotto.

You see

a path

to the west.

You see

a path

through the pine trees, leading westwards.

smell.content: You detect a faint smell of slime coming from the <d>north</d>.

4.location: You find yourself in a pine forest.

portal.content: Head eastwards on the path through the trees

sight.content:
You see

a path

to the east.

You see

a path

through the trees, leading in an eastwards direction.
